website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOwalk Max - Privy managed to meet the expectations of consumers when it came to style and comfort. It was also lauded for its lightweight nature, durability, and ease of use. Despite a few minor gripes, the product came highly recommended because of all the positive marks it possessed.
pros: The comfort offered by the Skechers GOwalk Max - Privy wowed many reviewers
Numerous consumers commended the footwear’s versatility
it was great for extended periods of walking, standing, and some even wore it to the gym
The size and the width of this Skechers Performance walking shoe were perfect, according to plenty of buyers
Multiple shoppers found the trainer to be good-looking
A small number of testers believed that the footgear was durable
Owners with mobility issues appreciated the slip-on style of the merchandise
The lightweight nature of the product delighted several people
cons: The lack of color options for the wide version disappointed a commenter
One person ranted that the footwear needed breaking in to fit more comfortably

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for nurses and healthcare workers.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a longtime for shoes that can replace my Clark unloops and I came across these. Although they are for men, they are suitable for women too. These shoes ar very comfortable and help me with my 12 hour shifts!!! I would definitely re purchase and recommend these shoes for healthcare workers.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Namano

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: These are a christmas presant for my dad so i cnt comment on fit & comfort but i can say they look good ,great quility and the sizing looks right .I read the reviews which wer great so im hoping my dad likes them .
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a present for my partner he said he has never had a pair of shoes that were so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Light and cool.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and super comfy, feels a bit loose for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Stoffel

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfy Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair now over 4 years, and I never wear anything else for walking in comfort in the Eastern Algarve.
customer_reviews.author: David Schofield

customer_reviews.title: more slipper than a trainer
customer_reviews.text: These really are more of a house slipper than a trainer And come up a size larger Gave them to my Dad as Slippers
customer_reviews.author: Bridger

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband he loves them and they are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Y Meagher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lightweight shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a multi-purpose leisure shoe. They are light and comfortable and meet my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: LolK

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product so def recommend Skechers
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived in good time and are very comfortable albeit slightly large but I expected that having read reviews and didn't want to risk ordering a half size down
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor slippers
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Walk for miles come home feet as fresh as a daisy !! Fantastic as I struggle with my feet
customer_reviews.author: Mr R W Shirley

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go Walk Max-Privy Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: Get the maximum comfort and cushioning for athletic walking with the Skechers go walk max. Mesh fabric upper with cushioned, supportive sole design. Designed with Skechers performance technology and materials specifically for athletic walking. Air cooled goga mat™ technology insole with high-rebound cushioning.
feature_bullets: Get the maximum comfort and cushioning for athletic walking with the Skechers GOwalk Max - Privy. Mesh fabric upper with cushioned, supportive sole design. Designed with Skechers Performance technology and materials specifically for athletic walking. Air Cooled Goga Mat Technology insole with high-rebound cushioning.

UPPER: Super lightweight mesh fabric upper for ideal fit. Smooth synthetic overlays at toe, sides and heel for added stability. Slip on design with heel pull on loop. Extra padded heel for walking comfort. Breathable solid colored mesh fabric upper. Side GOwalk logo.

MIDSOLE CUSHION: Skechers GOwalk Max midsole and outsole for high level cushioning and support. 5GEN sole - proprietary lightweight injection-molded compound with memory retention helps absorb impact. Soft flexible one piece midsole and outsole design.

INSOLE CUSHION: Air Cooled Goga Mat technology insole for maximum support and cushioning. Features high-rebound cushioning with responsive feedback. OUTSOLE/BOTTOM: Flexible rubber sole provides durability and stability. Soft flexible one piece midsole and outsole design.
MACHINE WASHABLE design for easy care - wash on gentle cycle cold, hang to air dry. WEIGHT: 7.5 oz. per shoe in a men's size 9.
